title: The First Meeting
description: Sarah Smith cannot believe her luck when she lands a job at Zoom Corp. She uses her acting skills to upgrade her position from secretary and executive and she thinks that her tide has finally changed.When Sarah meets a mysterious man, Bradley, in the elevator at work, she feels tingles and anger and ends up telling him a couple of lies about her relationship with the CEO of the Co., Harry Green.Bradley captivates her and she succumbs to a date and sensual night with him, only to slip out of his apartment early the next morning and continue on with her life. She had no idea that her life was never going to be the same again.'The First Meeting' is the first book in the 'How To Catch A Billionaire' series. It is an erotic romance with approximately 13,000 words.
author: Helen    Cooper
